item.title: Spawn item command
item.dc:creator: @titans38120 titans38120
item.description:
@titans38120 wrote:

put this command under any other command such as your home command:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerRights >= 3)) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));

            if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) {
                addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
            } else {
                sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist");
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! ");
        }
    }[/code]

Read full topic
